tasks.title: Set up React Native Project
tasks.description: Initialize a new React Native project using Expo CLI and configure essential dependencies including navigation, state management, and UI components.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication Flow
tasks.description: Create login and registration screens with form validation. Integrate JWT authentication and secure route handling using React Navigation.

tasks.title: Design Custom Components
tasks.description: Build reusable UI components including custom buttons, cards, and form inputs. Ensure consistent styling and proper prop handling.

tasks.title: Implement API Integration
tasks.description: Set up Axios for API calls, create API services, and implement proper error handling. Add loading states and error messages for better UX.

tasks.title: Add Data Persistence
tasks.description: Implement AsyncStorage for local data persistence. Create utility functions for storing and retrieving user preferences and cached data.
